mapper.select: select bq.data_no, bq.question_title, bq.question_type_id, bq.question_state_id, bq.create_date, bq.create_user_Id, d1.value as questionTypeName, d2.value as questionStateName from bte_question bq left join sys_dict d1 on d1.code = bq.question_type_id and d1.type = 'stlx' left join sys_dict d2 on d2.code = bq.question_state_id and d2.type = 'qyzt'

SELECT bq.data_no, bq.question_title, bq.question_type_id, bq.question_state_id, bq.create_date, bq.create_user_Id FROM bte_question bq, bte_evalrefquestion ref, bte_evaluate be WHERE bq.data_no = ref.question_id AND be.data_no = ref.eval_id AND be.data_no = #{evalId}
